sentences.english: In ancient times it was etiquette to present your full-size visiting card when giving someone a gift.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，送禮物時附上自己的名帖，是一種禮儀。

sentences.english: An ancient Mediterranean seagoing vessel propelled by oars.
sentences.chinese: 一種古時在地中海內靠槳推進的遠洋輪船。

sentences.english: The president also harked back to ancient Sinhalese martial heroes.
sentences.chinese: 總統先生還提及了古時的幸哈族戰爭英雄。

sentences.english: In ancient times, all things upon Earth smelled sweet like flowers.
sentences.chinese: 在遠古時代，地球上的萬物都聞起來就象花朵一樣。

sentences.english: The current leaders are just like those from ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 現在的領導人就跟來自古時候一樣。

sentences.english: In ancient times, warriors fought on horses.
sentences.chinese: 在古時候，武士都騎在馬上作戰。

sentences.english: In ancient times the messages were relayed from one place to another.
sentences.chinese: 古時候信息是用接力的方式從一地傳送到另一地。

sentences.english: Its unique architecture symbolises the ancient Chinese philosophy of a square earth with a round sky above.
sentences.chinese: 其獨特的建築代表了古時中國天圓地方的學說。

sentences.english: See, also the aggression, the Karma that you are doing are also ancient.
sentences.chinese: 你在做的侵略和業報也是遠古時代的東西。

sentences.english: During the Middle Ages, many Christians visited Rome because it was where the Pope lived.
sentences.chinese: 中古時代，許多基督徒因教宗住在當地而造訪羅馬。

sentences.english: The museum has a large collection of sculptures dating from the ancient world.
sentences.chinese: 這個博物館收藏有大量早自上古時代起的雕塑作品。

sentences.english: Why is the Middle Ages also called the Dark Ages?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼中古時代被稱爲黑暗時代？

sentences.english: In ancient China, etiquette for funerals was set by the emperor.
sentences.chinese: 喪禮在中國古時候是由皇帝制定的。

sentences.english: People in ancient times spent a fortune on elixirs for fear of dying.
sentences.chinese: 古時候的人因爲怕死，因此花很多錢在長生不老藥。

sentences.english: In ancient time, the Yin people deeply believed the religion of ghosts and gods.
sentences.chinese: 在上古時代，殷人信仰鬼神的宗教觀念最爲濃厚。

sentences.english: In ancient times, the Great Wall fortified China against barbarian invasions.
sentences.chinese: 古時候，長城保衛着中國，使之免遭蠻夷的入侵。

definition: to pass on/to hand down/tradition has it that .../according to legend
to be generally referred to (as)/generic term
folk art consisting of storytelling to music
